KM Summit 2019: Revolusi 4.0 Jadi Peluang atau Tantangan?
05 Nov 2019, 09:23 by Mukhlis Dinillah


Foto: Mukhlis Dinillah/detikcom

Bandung - Revolusi industri 4.0 dan era Society 5.0 yang terjadi saat ini tentunya berdampak terhadap implementasi manajemen pengetahuan dalam sebuah organisasi. Pemanfaatan media game dan digitalisasi menjadi komponen penting saat ini.Hal itu dikatakan President of Knowledge Management Society Indonesia Jann Hidajat Tjakraatmadja di Knowledge Management Summit ke-3 di Hotel Hilton, Kota Bandung, Selasa (5/11/2019). Tema besar yang diangkat yaitu Innovative Learning To re Use Knowledge Asset In Corporation and Public Services at Society 5.0.Menurutnya revolusi industri 4.0 tidak bisa dipungkiri memberikan dampak positif berupa kemudahan masyarakat mengakses informasi dan pemanfaatan teknologi secara luas. Termasuk dalam implementasi manajemen pengetahuan dalam sebuah organisasi."Isu ini menjadi penting karena telah terjadinya suatu evolusi dan revolusi manajemen pengetahuan dan proses pembelajaran melalui penggunaan media game dan digitalisasi," kata Jann dalam sambutannya.Menurutnya implementasi manajemen pengetahuan di sebuah organisasi akan membawa banyak manfaat khususnya dalam meningkatkan performansi dan daya saing. Teknologi yang ada saat ini akan berkontribusi secara signifikan bagi setiap SDM dalam organisasi tersebut."Namun jika perkembangan teknologi digital yang begitu cepat tidak direspon secara arif dan bijaksana oleh suatu organisasi maka akan berbalik menjadi suatu ancaman serius," tutur dia.Ia menuturkan melalui KM-Summit 2019, diharapkan menjadi forum bersama berbagi pengetahuan, pengalaman untuk terciptanya strategi serta inovasi yang efektif dan efisien. Terutama pemanfaatan teknologi untuk mengakselerasi sebuah organisasi atau perusahaan.Dalam kegiatan ini hadir para praktisi dan akademisi di bidang KM dan Innovative Learning untuk bersama-sama mempersiapkan Modal SDM Indonesia menghadapi Era Industri 4.0 dan Era Society 5.0. "KM Summit 2019 ini untuk menawarkan solusi melalui serangkaian sesi seminar bersama dengan sejumlah pakar dan workshop," kata Jann.Simak Video "Bahas Industri 4.0, Jokowi Targetkan 10 Juta Lapangan Kerja Baru"[Gambas:Video 20detik](mud/hns)

KM Summit 2019: Revolution 4.0 So Opportunity or Challenge?
05 Nov 2019, 09:23 by Mukhlis Dinillah


Photo: Mukhlis Dinillah / detikcom

Bandung - The industrial revolution 4.0 and the era of Society 5.0 that is happening now certainly has an impact on the implementation of knowledge management in an organization. Utilization of game media and digitalization is an important component at this time. It was said by the President of Knowledge Management Society of Indonesia Jann Hidajat Tjakraatmadja at the 3rd Knowledge Management Summit at the Hilton Hotel, Bandung City, Tuesday (11/05/2019). The big theme raised was Innovative Learning to Use Knowledge Asset in Corporation and Public Services at Society 5.0. According to the industrial revolution 4.0, it cannot be denied that it has a positive impact in the form of people's ease of accessing information and widespread use of technology. "This issue becomes important because there has been an evolution and revolution of knowledge management and learning processes through the use of media games and digitalization," Jann said in his remarks. According to the implementation of knowledge management in an organization will bring many benefits especially in improving performance and competitiveness. Existing technology will contribute significantly to every HR in the organization. "But if the rapid development of digital technology is not responded wisely and wisely by an organization it will turn into a serious threat," he said. He said through KM -Summit 2019, is expected to be a joint forum for sharing knowledge, experiences for the creation of effective and efficient strategies and innovations. Especially the use of technology to accelerate an organization or company. In this activity present practitioners and academics in the field of KM and Innovative Learning to jointly prepare the Indonesian Human Capital to face the Industrial Era 4.0 and Era Society 5.0. "KM Summit 2019 is to offer solutions through a series of seminar sessions together with a number of experts and workshops," said Jann.
